title: Drawing, "Illustration of Construction of Aviation Building by William Lescaze and J. Gordon Carr Associates for the 1939 New York World's Fair", ca. 1938
medium: Black chalk on white wove paper
signed: Signed in black chalk, lower left:  Hugh Ferriss
description: Side view of a large hangar-like building under construction.  Consists of three parts:  convex facade, centrally inclining body, and domed rear. Suggestion of people at entrance of  building.

participants.person_name: William Lescaze and J. Gordon Carr, Associates, Architects

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Illustration of Construction of Aviation Building by William Lescaze and J. Gordon Carr Associates for the 1939 New York World's Fair", ca. 1938.
ca. 1938. Black chalk on white wove paper. Gift of Mrs. Hugh Ferriss. 1964-5-7.
